remarks: The value of the Euclidean metric.  Compare with ~ rrnmval . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jun-2019.)
statement:
rrxmval.1 $e |- X = { h e. ( RR ^m I ) | h finSupp 0 } $.
rrxmval.d $e |- D = ( dist ` ( RR^ ` I ) ) $.
rrxmval $p |- ( ( I e. V /\ F e. X /\ G e. X ) -> ( F D G ) = ( sqrt ` sum_ k e. ( ( F supp 0 ) u. ( G supp 0 ) ) ( ( ( F ` k ) - ( G ` k ) ) ^ 2 ) ) ) $.
$d F h k $.
$d G h k $.
$d I h k $.
$d V h k $.
$d X k $.
